class:
Mage
Reduces your target's resistance to all your spells by 5 and reduces the threat caused by your Arcane spells by 20%. Reduces your target's resistance to all your spells by 10 and reduces the threat caused by your Arcane spells by 40%.
Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 2%. Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 4%. Reduces the chance that the opponent can resist your Arcane spells by 6%.
Gives you a 20% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles. Gives you a 40% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles. Gives you a 60% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles. Gives you a 80% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles. Gives you a 100% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while channeling Arcane Missiles.
Increases all resistances by 2 and restores Mana equal to 2% of the spell damage you take. Increases all resistances by 4 and restores Mana equal to 4% of the spell damage you take. Increases all resistances by 6 and restores Mana equal to 6% of the spell damage you take. Increases all resistances by 8 and restores Mana equal to 8% of the spell damage you take. Increases all resistances by 10 and restores Mana equal to 10% of the spell damage you take.
Gives you a 2% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target. The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%. Gives you a 4% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target. The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%. Gives you a 6% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target. The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%. Gives you a 8% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target. The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%. Gives you a 10% chance of entering a Clearcasting state after any damage spell hits a target. The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next damage spell by 100%.
Allows 10% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting. Allows 20% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting. Allows 30% of your Mana regeneration to continue while casting.
Increases your total Intellect and reduces the Mana cost of your Arcane spells by 2%. Increases your total Intellect and reduces the Mana cost of your Arcane spells by 4%. Increases your total Intellect and reduces the Mana cost of your Arcane spells by 6%. Increases your total Intellect and reduces the Mana cost of your Arcane spells by 8%. Increases your total Intellect and reduces the Mana cost of your Arcane spells by 10%.
Blasts the target with arcane energy, causing 74-80 Arcane damage. Only usable after casting Arcane Missiles or Arcane Explosion.
Decreases the mana lost per point of damage taken when Mana Shield is active by 10%. Decreases the mana lost per point of damage taken when Mana Shield is active by 20%. Decreases the mana lost per point of damage taken when Mana Shield is active by 30%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Explosion and Arcane Discharge spells by an additional 2%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Explosion and Arcane Discharge spells by an additional 4%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Arcane Explosion and Arcane Discharge spells by an additional 6%.
Gives your Counterspell a 50% chance to silence the target for 4 sec. Gives your Counterspell a 100% chance to silence the target for 4 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Blink spell by 5 seconds. Reduces the cooldown of your Blink spell by 10 seconds.
Your Mana Gems, when consumed, grant you a protective shield that absorbs damage equal to 25% of the Mana restored. Your Mana Gems, when consumed, grant you a protective shield that absorbs damage equal to 50% of the Mana restored.
When activated, your next Mage spell with a casting time less than 10 sec becomes an instant cast spell.
Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 1%. Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 2%. Increases your spell damage and critical strike chance by 3%.
Gives your Arcane Explosion, Arcane Discharge and Arcane Missiles spells a 5% chance to increase the damage of your next Fireball or Frostbolt spell by 25%. Gives your Arcane Explosion, Arcane Discharge and Arcane Missiles spells a 10% chance to increase the damage of your next Fireball or Frostbolt spell by 25%. Gives your Arcane Explosion, Arcane Discharge and Arcane Missiles spells a 15% chance to increase the damage of your next Fireball or Frostbolt spell by 25%. Gives your Arcane Explosion, Arcane Discharge and Arcane Missiles spells a 20% chance to increase the damage of your next Fireball or Frostbolt spell by 25%. Gives your Arcane Explosion, Arcane Discharge and Arcane Missiles spells a 25% chance to increase the damage of your next Fireball or Frostbolt spell by 25%.
When activated, your spells deal 30% more damage while costing 30% more mana to cast. This effect lasts 15 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Fireball spell by 0.1 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Fireball spell by 0.2 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Fireball spell by 0.3 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Fireball spell by 0.4 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Fireball spell by 0.5 sec.
Gives your Fire spells a 2% chance to stun the target for 2 sec. Gives your Fire spells a 4% chance to stun the target for 2 sec. Gives your Fire spells a 6% chance to stun the target for 2 sec. Gives your Fire spells a 8% chance to stun the target for 2 sec. Gives your Fire spells a 10% chance to stun the target for 2 sec.
Increases the range of your Fire spells by 3 yards. Increases the range of your Fire spells by 6 yards.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Flamestrike, Pyroblast, Fire Blast and Scorch spells by 2%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Flamestrike, Pyroblast, Fire Blast and Scorch spells by 4%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Flamestrike, Pyroblast, Fire Blast and Scorch spells by 6%.
Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Blast spell by 0.5 sec. Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Blast spell by 1 sec. Reduces the cooldown of your Fire Blast spell by 1.5 sec.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire spells by 5% while above 90% Mana. Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire spells by 10% while above 90% Mana.
Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 148 to 195 Fire damage and an additional 56 Fire damage over 12 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Flamestrike spell by 0.25 secs. Reduces the casting time of your Flamestrike spell by 0.5 secs. Reduces the casting time of your Flamestrike spell by 0.75 secs.
. In addition, reduces the threat caused by your Fire spells by 7%. Gives your Fire spells a 10% chance to increase your Spirit by 100% for 8 secs. In addition, reduces the threat caused by your Fire spells by 14%. Gives your Fire spells a 10% chance to increase your Spirit by 150% for 8 secs. In addition, reduces the threat caused by your Fire spells by 21%. Gives your Fire spells a 10% chance to increase your Spirit by 200% for 8 secs. In addition, reduces the threat caused by your Fire spells by 28%. Gives your Fire spells a 10% chance to increase your Spirit by 250% for 8 secs. In addition, reduces the threat caused by your Fire spells by 35%.
Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 2%. Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 4%. Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 6%. Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 8%. Increases the damage done by your Fire spells by 10%.
Your critical strikes from Fire damage spells cause the target to burn for an additional 8% of your spell's damage over 4 sec. Your critical strikes from Fire damage spells cause the target to burn for an additional 16% of your spell's damage over 4 sec. Your critical strikes from Fire damage spells cause the target to burn for an additional 25% of your spell's damage over 4 sec.
Increases your chance to hit with Frost and Fire spells by 1%. Increases your chance to hit with Frost and Fire spells by 2%. Increases your chance to hit with Frost and Fire spells by 3%.
Causes you to be healed for 25% of your max Health when you take lethal damage. This effect costs 85% of your maximum Mana. 5 minute cooldown. Causes you to be healed for 25% of your max Health when you take lethal damage. This effect costs 70% of your maximum Mana. 5 minute cooldown.
A wave of flame radiates outward from the caster, damaging all enemies caught within the blast for 160 to 192 Fire damage, and dazing them for 6 sec.
Your Fire Blast and Scorch spells have a 35% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Fire damage. This vulnerability increases the Fire damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 30 sec. Stacks up to 5 times. Your Fire Blast and Scorch spells have a 70% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to Fire damage. This vulnerability increases the Fire damage dealt to your target by 3% and lasts 30 sec. Stacks up to 5 times.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire spells by 1%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire spells by 2%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire spells by 3%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire spells by 4%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Fire spells by 5%.
When activated, this spell causes each of your Fire damage spell hits to increase your critical strike chance with Fire damage spells by 10%. This effect lasts until you have caused 3 critical strikes with Fire spells.
Increases the armor and resistances given by your Frost Armor and Ice Armor spells by 15%. In addition, gives your Frost Ward a 10% chance to reflect Frost spells and effects while active. Increases the armor and resistances given by your Frost Armor and Ice Armor spells by 30%. In addition, gives your Frost Ward a 20% chance to reflect Frost spells and effects while active.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 2% and damage taken from periodic effects by 5% Reduces all spell damage taken by 4% and damage taken from periodic effects by 10% Reduces all spell damage taken by 6% and damage taken from periodic effects by 15%
Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by 0.1 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by 0.2 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by 0.3 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by 0.4 sec. Reduces the casting time of your Frostbolt spell by 0.5 sec.
Increases the range of your Frostbolt, Freezing Blast and Blizzard spells and the radius of your Frost Nova and Cone of Cold spells by 10%. Increases the range of your Frostbolt, Freezing Blast and Blizzard spells and the radius of your Frost Nova and Cone of Cold spells by 20%.
Gives your Frost spells with Chill effects a 25% chance to build up Permafrost on targets. Permafrost freezes the target for 5 seconds upon reaching 8 stacks. Lasts 10 seconds. Gives your Frost spells with Chill effects a 50% chance to build up Permafrost on targets. Permafrost freezes the target for 5 seconds upon reaching 8 stacks. Lasts 10 seconds. Gives your Frost spells with Chill effects a 75% chance to build up Permafrost on targets. Permafrost freezes the target for 5 seconds upon reaching 8 stacks. Lasts 10 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of your Frost Nova spell by 2 sec. Reduces the cooldown of your Frost Nova spell by 4 sec.
Reduces damage taken from area of effect attacks by 5% and increases the damage dealt by your Blizzard and Cone of Cold spells by 4%. Reduces damage taken from area of effect attacks by 10% and increases the damage dealt by your Blizzard and Cone of Cold spells by 8%. Reduces damage taken from area of effect attacks by 15% and increases the damage dealt by your Blizzard and Cone of Cold spells by 12%.
You become encased in a block of ice, protecting you from all physical attacks and spells for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move or cast spells. Causes Hypothermia for 20 seconds, slowing your spell casting and movement speed by 25%.
Increases the critical strike chance of all your spells against frozen targets by 10%. Increases the critical strike chance of all your spells against frozen targets by 20%. Increases the critical strike chance of all your spells against frozen targets by 30%. Increases the critical strike chance of all your spells against frozen targets by 40%. Increases the critical strike chance of all your spells against frozen targets by 50%.
Reduces the mana cost of your Frost spells by 5% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by 10%. Reduces the mana cost of your Frost spells by 10% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by 20%. Reduces the mana cost of your Frost spells by 15% and reduces the threat caused by your Frost spells by 30%.
Increases the critical strike chance of your Frost spells by 1%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Frost spells by 2%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Frost spells by 3%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Frost spells by 4%. Increases the critical strike chance of your Frost spells by 5%.
Your Fire and Frost spell criticals will refund 10% of their base mana cost. Your Fire and Frost spell criticals will refund 20% of their base mana cost. Your Fire and Frost spell criticals will refund 30% of their base mana cost.
Reduces the cooldown of your Ice Block spell by 30 seconds and the duration of Hypothermia by 50%. Reduces the cooldown of your Ice Block spell by 60 seconds and the duration of Hypothermia by 100%.
Blasts the target with 133-146 Frost damage and applies 8 stacks of Permafrost.
Gives your Permafrost effect a 20% chance to apply Winter's Chill to the target for 15 sec when it accumulates 8 stacks of Permafrost. Winter's Chill increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by 15%. Gives your Permafrost effect a 40% chance to apply Winter's Chill to the target for 15 sec when it accumulates 8 stacks of Permafrost. Winter's Chill increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by 15%. Gives your Permafrost effect a 60% chance to apply Winter's Chill to the target for 15 sec when it accumulates 8 stacks of Permafrost. Winter's Chill increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by 15%. Gives your Permafrost effect a 80% chance to apply Winter's Chill to the target for 15 sec when it accumulates 8 stacks of Permafrost. Winter's Chill increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by 15%. Gives your Permafrost effect a 100% chance to apply Winter's Chill to the target for 15 sec when it accumulates 8 stacks of Permafrost. Winter's Chill increases the chance a Frost spell will critically hit the target by 15%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by 20%. Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by 40%. Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by 60%. Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by 80%. Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Frost spells by 100%.
Instantly shields you, absorbing 455 damage. Lasts 1 min. While the shield holds, spells will not be interrupted.
